name: Viper5
tagline: fifth version of VIPER -- features encryption for the data
body:
This is the fifth version of VIPER. This version will feature encryption for the data and the master key is hashed using SHA and stored in the file. Both these features ensure that the data you store is completely safe.

 This is the Flickr set where I have shared some screenshots of the previous version of VIPER(4.1) 

My website:
